sect2.title: Slice Using Guides

indexterm.secondary: Cut off image according to guides

sect2.para: The Slice Using Guides command slices up the current image, based on the image's guides. It cuts the image along each guide, similar to slicing documents in an office with a guillotine (paper cutter) and creates new images out of the pieces. For further information on guides, see .

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the main menu through
Image Slice Using Guides .
